trans-unit.source: Provides utility methods and commands to create and delete highlight, ink sticky note, and text sticky note annotations.
The annotation service from which to remove highlight annotations.
Clears all highlight annotations from the current selection of the viewer control associated with the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
If the current viewer selection is zero length or does not overlap any annotation highlights, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.ClearHighlightsForSelection%2A> performs no operation.
trans-unit.target: 현재 뷰어 선택의 길이가 0 이거나 주석 강조 표시, 겹치지 않는 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.ClearHighlightsForSelection%2A> 연산을 수행 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the current viewer selection overlaps a highlight only partially, only the portion of the selection that overlaps is cleared and the unselected portion of the annotation highlight remains.
trans-unit.target: 현재 뷰어 선택 영역이 강조 표시를 부분적 으로만 중첩 겹치는 선택의 부분만 지워지고 주석 강조 표시 선택 되지 않은 부분 유지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
The annotation service to use to create the highlight annotation.
The author of the annotation.
The brush to use to draw the highlight over the selected content.
Creates a highlight annotation on the current selection of the viewer control associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
The highlight annotation; or <see langword="null" />, if there is no selected content to highlight.

The highlight annotation is anchored to the content defined by the current selection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> control specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 현재 선택 영역에 정의 된 콘텐츠를 강조 표시 주석이 앵커 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> 에 지정 된 컨트롤은 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> 생성자입니다.

trans-unit.source: If there is no selected content (the selection length is zero length), no annotation is created and an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: (선택 길이가 0) 선택한 콘텐츠는 주석이 없으며 만들어지지 및 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: `author` can be specified as `null` in which case no author is defined.
trans-unit.target: `author` 로 지정할 수 있습니다 `null` 없는 작성자가 정의 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: If `highlightBrush` is `null`, the default highlight brush of the given annotation `service` is used.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `highlightBrush` 은 `null`, 기본 브러시입니다. 지정된 된 주석 강조 표시 `service` 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateHighlightForSelection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 주석 `service` 을 호출 하 여 사용할 수 있어야 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 호출 하기 전에 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateHighlightForSelection%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
-or-
<paramref name="highlightBrush" /> in not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" />.
The viewer control contains no content selection.
The annotation service to use to create the ink sticky note annotation.
The author of the annotation.
Creates an ink sticky note annotation on the current selection of the viewer control associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />..
The ink sticky note annotation; or <see langword="null" />, if there is no selected content to annotate.

The ink sticky note annotation is anchored to the content defined by the current selection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> control specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 현재 선택 영역에 정의 된 콘텐츠 잉크 스티커 메모 주석이 앵커 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> 에 지정 된 컨트롤은 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> 생성자입니다.

trans-unit.source: If there is no user-selected content (the selection length is zero length), no annotation is created and an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: (선택 길이가 0) 사용자가 선택한 콘텐츠는 주석이 없으며 만들어지지 및 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: `author` can be specified as `null` in which case no author is defined.
trans-unit.target: `author` 로 지정할 수 있습니다 `null` 없는 작성자가 정의 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateInkStickyNoteForSelection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 주석 `service` 을 호출 하 여 사용할 수 있어야 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 호출 하기 전에 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateInkStickyNoteForSelection%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
The viewer control contains no content selection.
The annotation service to use to create the text sticky note annotation.
The author of the annotation.
Creates a text sticky note annotation on the current selection of the viewer control associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
The text sticky note annotation; or <see langword="null" />, if there is no selected content to annotate.

The text sticky note annotation is anchored to the content defined by the current selection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> control specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 스티커 메모 주석의 현재 선택 영역에 정의 된 콘텐츠 앵커 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> 에 지정 된 컨트롤은 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> 생성자입니다.

trans-unit.source: If there is no user-selected content (the selection length is zero length), no annotation is created and an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: (선택 길이가 0) 사용자가 선택한 콘텐츠는 주석이 없으며 만들어지지 및 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: `author` can be specified as `null` in which case no author is defined.
trans-unit.target: `author` 로 지정할 수 있습니다 `null` 없는 작성자가 정의 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateTextStickyNoteForSelection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 주석 `service` 을 호출 하 여 사용할 수 있어야 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 호출 하기 전에 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.CreateTextStickyNoteForSelection%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
The viewer control contains no content selection.
The annotation service from which to delete ink sticky note annotations.

Deletes ink sticky note annotations that are wholly contained within the current selection of the viewer control associated with the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

If the viewer control associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> contains no user selection or the user selection does not wholly contain any ink sticky note annotations, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteInkStickyNotesForSelection%2A> performs no operation.
trans-unit.target: 와 연결 된 뷰어 컨트롤에서 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> 사용자 또는 사용자 선택에 완전히 포함 되지 않는 모든 잉크 스티커 메모 주석 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteInkStickyNotesForSelection%2A> 연산을 수행 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteInkStickyNotesForSelection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 주석 `service` 을 호출 하 여 사용할 수 있어야 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 호출 하기 전에 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteInkStickyNotesForSelection%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
The annotation service from which to delete text sticky note annotations.

Deletes text sticky note annotations that are wholly contained within the current selection of the viewer control associated with the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

If the viewer control associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> contains no user selection or the user selection does not wholly contain any text sticky note annotations, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteTextStickyNotesForSelection%2A> performs no operation.
trans-unit.target: 와 연결 된 뷰어 컨트롤에서 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> 사용자 또는 사용자 선택에 완전히 포함 되지 않는 모든 텍스트 스티커 메모 주석 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteTextStickyNotesForSelection%2A> 연산을 수행 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteTextStickyNotesForSelection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 주석 `service` 을 호출 하 여 사용할 수 있어야 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 호출 하기 전에 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.DeleteTextStickyNotesForSelection%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="service" /> is not enabled.
The annotation service to use for this operation.
The annotation to get anchoring information for.
Returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo" /> object that provides anchoring information, such as the anchor location, about the specified annotation.
An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo" /> object that provides anchoring information about the specified annotation, or <see langword="null" /> if it cannot be resolved.
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.GetAnchorInfo%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationHelper.GetAnchorInfo%2A> 에 도입 된 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] 버전 3.5입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 [버전 및 종속성](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)을 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 주석 창이 간단한 문서 판독기 응용 프로그램이 것이 좋습니다.

trans-unit.source: The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document.
trans-unit.target: 주석 창은 문서에 고정된 주석 목록의 텍스트를 표시하는 목록 상자일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 목록 상자에서 항목을 선택하면 응용 프로그램에서 해당 주석 개체에 고정된 문서의 단락을 표시합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 주석 창으로 사용되는 목록 상자의 이벤트 처리기를 구현하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.
